definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: The reaction of ozone destruction is the chain reaction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏臭氧的反应是链反应。

sentences.english: The reaction of ozone destruction is the chain reaction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏臭氧的反应是链反应。

sentences.english: It takes away our edge, makes us groggy, and disrupts our sleep.
sentences.chinese: 它让我们反应迟钝，头昏脑胀，扰乱我们的睡眠。

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: The fibrous tissues aroud the tumor cells were positive for VG.
sentences.chinese: VG染色示肿瘤细胞周围有纤维组织反应增生。

sentences.english: Appreciation of sculpture depends upon the ability to respond to form in three dimension.
sentences.chinese: 对雕塑的鉴赏力取决于对立体的反应能力。

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们还不清楚这些反应会具体产生什么样的结果。

sentences.english: It's much cheaper to anticipate rather than respond.
sentences.chinese: 因为预先做出反应远比事后补救便宜的多。

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的电荷转移是反应的速度控制步。

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质反应与烧伤的严重性是平行的。

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反应是新近被用于有机合成的简单而重要的反应。

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反应是新近被用于有机合成的简单而重要的反应。

sentences.english: Because of how you reacted in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 一切皆由你早上的反应而起。

sentences.english: One of the disadvantages of the phenothiazines is their potential for dystonic effects.
sentences.chinese: 吩噻嗪类药物弊端在于其潜在的张力不能反应。

definition: to provoke/to irritate/to upset/to stimulate/to excite/irritant
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
